'''Limbo: Border Jail''' is a unique [[dōjutsu]] awakened by [[Madara Uchiha]]'s [[Rinnegan]].

==Overview==
The jutsu allows Madara to project {{translation|"shadows"|影|kage}} of himself into {{translation|'''Limbo'''|<ruby>輪墓<rt>リンボ</rt></ruby>|Rinbo|lit meaning= Wheel Grave}}, an invisible world that coexists with the physical world but that is ordinarily impossible to detect or perceive.<ref name="c674v1">''Naruto'' chapter 674, pages 5-7</ref> With one Rinnegan, Madara can form only one shadow, but with two Rinnegan, he can form up to four. Each shadow has the same abilities as the real Madara, with the added advantage of being untrackable.<ref name="d4"/> The shadows can attack targets, giving the appearance of an inexplicable force knocking them down,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 659, pages 12-15</ref> or they can defend Madara, giving the appearance of an invisible wall around him.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 676, page 6</ref> The shadows are invulnerable to any kind of physical damage and cannot be harmed through conventional means.<ref name="c674v1"/> A shadow's very formation can be used defensively, taking Madara's place mid-attack as a sort of [[Body Replacement Technique]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 674, page 14</ref> After a certain amount of time, a shadow will need to return to Madara's body, and he will likewise need to wait a certain amount of time before he can reform it.<ref name="c674v2">''Naruto'' chapter 674, pages 9-10</ref>

Against most opponents, Madara's shadows give him an insurmountable advantage. But [[Naruto Uzumaki]] and [[Sasuke Uchiha]], after receiving [[Six Paths chakra]], undermine some of the shadows' usual benefits: Sasuke can see them with his own Rinnegan; Naruto can [[sense]] them while using [[Six Paths Sage Mode]];<ref name="c674v1"/> Naruto can damage them using [[Six Paths Senjutsu]].<ref name="c674v2"/> Through a combination of these skills, Naruto is able to capture a shadow, preventing it from returning to Madara.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 675, pages 10-11</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Both the first word's [[Wikipedia:Furigana|furigana]] {{translation|''Rinbo''|リンボ}} and the second word {{translation|''Hengoku''|辺獄}} refer to [[Wikipedia:Limbo|Limbo]], with リンボ being the Japanese way of writing Limbo and 辺獄 being an actual translation of the word's meaning.
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', Madara's Limbo clones are capable of using [[Susanoo]].
* Alongside the [[Six Paths Ten-Tails Coffin Seal]], Madara could not use this technique as a [[Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation|reincarnated]] corpse.
